# Add Contact to List

# Description

Add contact to mailing list.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Mailing list - Select the mailing list from the available drop-down list or enter a custom list key. This field supports String type input.
* Emails - Provide a maximum of 10 email addresses in a comma-separated format. This field supports String type input.





* Add Contact - Automatically generated output variable.
